meanings.definition: The act of explaining or interpreting something.
meanings.sent1: Her explications of the science experiment helped everyone understand it better.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's explications of the poem made it easier to comprehend.
meanings.sent3: His explications of the magic trick made it seem even more mysterious.
meanings.sent4: The detective's explications of the crime scene were like unraveling a complex puzzle.
meanings.sent5: Through her explications, the concept became crystal clear to the students.

meanings.definition: A detailed explanation or analysis of a text or work of art.
meanings.sent1: The art critic's explications of the painting revealed hidden meanings.
meanings.sent2: The book included explications of the historical events for the readers.
meanings.sent3: His explications of the movie plot added a new layer of understanding.
meanings.sent4: Her explications of the sculpture brought out its true beauty.
meanings.sent5: The professor's explications of the novel were enlightening to the class.
